thread.title: Shirley Carter warns Whitney to back away from Mick in EastEnders | Metro News
thread.title_full: Shirley Carter warns Whitney to back away from Mick in EastEnders | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Shirley Carter warns Whitney to back away from Mick in EastEnders | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 11:58 pm (Picture: BBC) 
Fans have been noticing a growing closeness between Mick and Whitney Carter for some time in EastEnders and have been concerned that the stressed landlord might be tempted to cheat with his daughter-in-law while Linda remains away. And now Shirley decides that it’s time that Whitney took a step back from him. 
With everything getting on top of Mick, he has been terrified of losing the business and his freedom as a jail sentence hangs over him if he can’t pay off the fine. 
As Mick hits the bottle, Whitney tries to help him out with his problems and, while her idea leaves Mick embarrassed, she opens up to him over her desperation to put things right, feeling that she is the cause of all of the trouble. (Picture: BBC) 
Vulnerable Mick breaks down while they talk but it remains to be seen whether the two emotional characters will share another kiss – or even more. 
Regardless of where things stop, Shirley decides to do some damage limitation and warns Whitney to back off from Mick. (Picture: BBC) 
But how will Mick and Whitney react to this? And is Shirley right to be concerned? 
One to watch: Thursday 9th March at 7:30pm on BBC One. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
